"Skill Up & Ascension Material"

It can be said that it is the ingredient for materializing Heroic Spirits.

skills.name: Protection of Muse (Fake) EX

skills.detail: Gain a large amount of Critical Stars

noblePhantasms.name: Requiem for Death

buffs.name: Curse
buffs.detail: Lose HP at end of each turn

comments.comment:
A world renowned composer and a performer.
He lived in the 18th century, and possessed a sense of sound that's out of this world. He left us with many wonderful scores, and was loved by God. A miraculous genius.

Height/Weight: 180cm, 65kg
Origin: History
Region: Europe
Alignment: Neutral-Good
Gender: Male
Secretly he is happy about his alignment being the same as the person he loves.

Highly interested in the world of Magecraft, there were legends that he was involved in secret societies. As a Heroic Spirit, he uses Magecraft based from Orpheus, and even has knowledge of the Magecraft used by Solomon.
Normally, he would use sound as a catalyst to cast attacking spells.

Protection of Muse (Fake) : EX
Originally, this skill was the manifestation of the divine protection from Muse herself.
Here, this skill enables the user to distinguish sounds and perform brilliantly.
It increases the effect of any Magecraft involving music.
All these effects are manifested as one's "own innate ability."

A saint who devoted himself completely to music.
Unfortunately, as a human being he's not as
great.
He likes to chat with people and make jokes.
Out of all jokes he likes dirty ones the most, but he has forced himself to stop making them (because Marie told him to).

His music is always dedicated to one woman.
When he was a child, he was summoned to the palace in Vienna.
There he met a fair maiden, who shone more brilliantly than anybody...
The girl's name was Maria, later known as "Marie Antoinette."
The tragic Queen who was put to the guillotine.

He passed before Maria's death.
"If I was alive, I would never have let that happened...
her tragic death under a guillotine, she would never had to face that."
He understands that he may not have the right, but he can't help but wish...
that one day, happiness befalls upon his beloved Maria.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle: Congratulations! Today is the day on which your melody was born! Okay, let's go buy some music!

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle: I sense trouble... I think this will be a busy orchestra. Master, don't follow too closely.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Please request a piece if you'd like. I'm always ready to go.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle: No matter how demonic a performer I may be, I am a Servant. I yield the conductor's baton to you.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Our relationship? Hahaha.
Please do not ask me to comment on your conducting! I don't want to start a fight!

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: My likes? Music is my reason for living, it's not a matter of like or dislike... So it'd have to be dirty jokes... No, nothing!

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle: My dislikes, hmm? I would have to say Charles Sanson. He is not at all honest!

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Holy Grail originates from the cauldron.
I wonder what it would sound like if you made it ring...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle: One of the lowest ranks of Caster! That's me! I'm sorry, but don't rely on me for fighting! Hahaha!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
So, what can you rely on me for?
Come now, isn't that obvious? Everything other than fighting. I will enrich your life to new levels, me and my music!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
I'm not like the other unsociable artistic Servants. I'm pretty considerate of others.
Only Salieri who I, well, we've had a series of misunderstandings and mistakes between us.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
You're a strange one, to value me so highly. I might be a genius, but in the end I'm just a musician. You can leave me in the corner and think of me like a gramophone if you want.
...Hmm, I might have to start taking things seriously...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Eine kleine Nachtmusik.
This summons has been a great journey and sound. Enough to make me wish this long night would never end.
Thank you Master. We've been together awhile, and I hope we'll continue to get along.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
Heh...hehe, hyahahaha!
What the hell...what the hell...WHAT THE HELL!?
Your hatred for Amadeus has gotten so out of control that you seem almost like some sort of kids show hero! Stop...stop it! It's just too much! You're killing me, Salieri!

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 501500_0_G010]The next piece is... Ah, I should reconsider taking on so much work...

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501500_0_G020]The type of magecraft blessed by Orpheus,
I shall show you its heights... [delay 5.8]or not.
[id 501500_0_G021]Come on, let's take it easy. [delay 4.2]Even if we slack off life will catch up to us quickly enough.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501500_0_G030]There's no point striving for strength alone.
[id 501500_0_G031]Let's talk the night away. Unfortunately, indecent topics are banned.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501500_0_G040]...My fingers feel fluid...
[delay 3.2]My performance skills have risen another step...
[id 501500_0_G041]Though the jealousy of others is troublesome when you're a genius.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501500_0_G050]How many times did I reach this stage in life? [delay 4.3]I feel I could turn any event into music.
[id 501500_0_G051]Tremble with emotion, Master. I am now unmistakably almighty.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text:
[r]
Leave battles aside, I promise only to decorate your life!
voiceLines.subtitle:
I am Amadeus Wolfgang Mozart!
Leave battles aside, I promise only to decorate your life!

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Crescendo!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Decrescendo!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Fortissimo!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: A change of tone here, I think!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Now, which Bach do you prefer?

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: A goddess' divine protection resides in a good piano.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Be silent! I shall bring to you the most exquisite time!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: It's time for some fun music.

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hmm, I'm sorry. Honestly, this performance was only third rate.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Amazing, I'm such a genius!

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Ahh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Aahh!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Maria... The promise, the piano...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: The concert... will be canceled...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes, yes.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Louder there.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Quieter there.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Time for a performance. Enjoy it to the fullest!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 501500_0_B050,501500_0_B051]Listen, to this bewitching sound! 
Requiem for Death.[margin 3]
